responseText: I've been dragging my butt up and down the roads from Lionhold to wherever Tom, Jaelynn, or Khyber is headed escorting them past busted bridges or goblin ambushes all week. If that wasn't enough, though, there's been a movement in the ranks to try to clean up the roads a bit, and get all those lost goods littering the way back to the settlers that lost them. There are logistics clerks in each settlement waiting for us to bring lost parcels in, but I'm bushed. Think you could manage to shuffle some misplaced belongings along the road for us? You'd be doing a world of good for the newcomers.
name: SQ_Lionhold_Clotharmor_Jordi_11_Response
